forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
